name: Robo Car Wash Salon
description:
Do they like working with you on the family car? Then they can work in their very own robot cars garage. They will get to fix cars and even soup them up with endless car upgrades so they can have the coolest car on the road.

Or, children can start out by choosing from any of the fifteen characters and set off to purchase their very own first car at the car dealership! They can drive off the lot (but don’t forget to gas it up first!) and explore the world!
